title: Pedestal (Enakhra's Lament)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Pedestal is found in the centre of Enakhra's Temple, it has a recess in the shape of a camel's head, and four globe shaped light, one in each corner. During the Enakhra's Lament quest, the player first attempts to fit the statue head into the recess, but it does not fit perfectly. A mould must therefor be made in order to craft a camel head that fits the recess using a 5kg block of granite. After the recess has been filled, the player must solve a puzzle in each of the four corners of the temple, with each completion resulting in the corresponding globe on the pedestal being lit. Starting in the top-left corner and going counter-clockwise, the globes correspond to blood, ice, shadow and smoke.

Pedestal is found in the centre of Enakhra's Temple, it has a recess in the shape of a camel's head, and four globe shaped light, one in each corner. During the Enakhra's Lament quest, the player first attempts to fit the statue head into the recess, but it does not fit perfectly. A mould must therefor be made in order to craft a camel head that fits the recess using a 5kg block of granite. After the recess has been filled, the player must solve a puzzle in each of the four corners of the temple, with each completion resulting in the corresponding globe on the pedestal being lit. Starting in the top-left corner and going counter-clockwise, the globes correspond to blood, ice, shadow and smoke.

'''Pedestal''' is found in the centre of [[Enakhra's Temple]], it has a recess in the shape of a [[camel]]'s head, and four globe shaped light, one in each corner. During the [[Enakhra's Lament]] quest, the player first attempts to fit the [[Stone head#camel|statue head]] into the recess, but it does not fit perfectly. A [[Camel mould (p)|mould]] must therefor be made in order to craft a camel head that fits the recess using a 5kg block of [[Granite#5kg|granite]]. After the recess has been filled, the player must solve a puzzle in each of the four corners of the temple, with each completion resulting in the corresponding globe on the pedestal being lit. Starting in the top-left corner and going counter-clockwise, the globes correspond to blood, ice, shadow and smoke.

{{Enakhra's Lament}}
